archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0552
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a prospective customer, I want to be able to read reviews on devices I'm interested in, so that I can make a more educated choice on what I want to purchase

properties.value: Details about integration needed. OOTB an external integration (for example with PB technologies) needed to fetch reviews (simple integration). To be verified. Review module within BSS is not there yet.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
